Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.virtualModel

Class ClientBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observer.ObservableObject<ModelListener>
it.polimi.ingsw.client.virtualModel.ClientBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<ModelListener>
public class ClientBoard extends ObservableObject<ModelListener>
This class represents the board in the virtual model. It aims to represent the state of the board in the client and update it if necessary
